text: - Log in to the Illinois Tech Portal . - Type "Order Official Transcript" in the search bar. - Click on the "Order Official Transcript" Tool. After placing your order, you will be contacted when your transcript request has been processed. - Visit Illinois Tech's Parchment page to complete the online order process and pay by credit card. After placing your order, you will be contacted when your transcript has been processed and mailed. - If you do not have access to the internet, you may contact our service provider, Parchment, at 847.716.3005 for assistance with placing an order.
